com.wealdtech.hawk

Class HawkCredentials

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wealdtech.hawk.HawkCredentials
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<HawkCredentials>

    public final class HawkCredentials
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<HawkCredentials>
    HawkCredentials contains the information required to authenticate requests requests between a client and server.

    Note that the key in the Hawk credentials is a shared secret, and should be protected accordingly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  HawkCredentials.Algorithm 
      static class  HawkCredentials.Builder
      Builder class to create a set of Hawk credentials.
